extension.name: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Filter
extension.description: Protect yourself against XSS and XSRF attacks in form submissions.

releases.release: - Replaced deprecated preg_replace /e in extension.driver.php - Added German translation
- Small patch to the attribute context cleaner
- Update extension to include context aware XSS functions for the Frontend. Big thanks to [Ashar Javed](http://www.nds.rub.de/chair/people/JAsh/)
- Update extension to include a Validate XSRF filter
- Add Russian translation - Additional detection logic adding for `feed` and `data` protocols - Update all links to **getsymphony.com**
- More robust checking to handle upload fields and integers

- Static `detectXSS` function so that logic can be used by other extensions outside of the Event Options context - Events with the XSS Filter can now handle nested field data to an infinite level - Slight performance tweak if XSS is detected - Additional detection logic adding for `livescript` and `mocha` protocols
